Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-24400 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-24400 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.14.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.
